00028 template <class T>
00029 class GTreeNode
00030 {
00031   friend class GMultiSet<T>;
00032   friend class GBTree<GTreeNode<T> >;
00033   friend class GDList<GTreeNode<T> >;
00034   friend class GDListCursor<GTreeNode<T> >;
00035   friend class GDListConstCursor<GTreeNode<T> >;
00036 
00037 private:
00038   GTreeNode<T>*             _next;   
00039   GTreeNode<T>*             _prev;   
00040   T                         _key;
00041   GDList<GNode>             _list;
00042 
00043 public:
00045   GTreeNode() : _next(0), _prev(0) {}
00046 };

00050 typedef GNode GMultiSetItem;
00051 
00053 template <class T>
00054 class GMultiSet : private GBTree<GTreeNode<T> >
00055 {
00056   typedef GBTree<GTreeNode<T> > _Base;
00057 
00058 public:
00060   typedef GTreeNode<T>  GTreeItem;
00061 
00063   GMultiSet() {}
00064 
00066   ~GMultiSet() {}
00067 
00069   T getKey(const GMultiSetItem& it) const { return it._key; }
00070 
00072   bool isEmpty() const { return GBTree<GTreeItem>::isEmpty(); }
00073 
00075   void clear() { GBTree<GTreeItem>::clear(); }
00076 
00078   void insert(GMultiSetItem& elem, T k);
00079 
00081   void insertFront(GMultiSetItem& elem, T k);
00082 
00086   GDList<GMultiSetItem>* decendingOrder();
00087 
00091   GDList<GMultiSetItem>* ascendingOrder();
00092 };

00096 /* The following codes should be put in a .cpp file. However, keyword
00097    'export' is not supported by most compilers. 
00098  */
00099 template <class T>
00100 void GMultiSet<T>::insertFront(GMultiSetItem& elem, T k)
00101 {
00102   if (_Base::_root == 0) {
00103     _Base::_root = new GTreeItem;
00104     _Base::_root->_key = k;
00105     _Base::_root->_list.pushFront(elem);
00106   }
00107 
00108   GTreeItem& cur = _Base::_root;
00109   while (1) {
00110     if (cur._key > k) {
00111       if (cur._prev != 0) {
00112         cur = *cur._prev;
00113         continue;
00114       }
00115       else {
00116         cur._prev = new GTreeItem;
00117         cur._prev->_key = k;
00118         cur._prev->_list.pushFront(elem);
00119         break;
00120       }
00121     }
00122     else if (cur._key < k) {
00123       if (cur._next != 0) {
00124         cur = *cur._next;
00125         continue;
00126       }
00127       else {
00128         cur._next = new GTreeItem;
00129         cur._next->_key = k;
00130         cur._next->_list.pushFront(elem);
00131         break;
00132       }
00133     }
00134     else {
00135       cur._list.pushFront(elem);
00136       break;
00137     }
00138   }
00139   // re-balancing?
00140 }
00141 
00142 template <class T>
00143 void GMultiSet<T>::insert(GMultiSetItem& elem, T k)
00144 {
00145   if (_Base::_root == 0) {
00146     _Base::_root = new GTreeItem;
00147     _Base::_root->_key = k;
00148     _Base::_root->_list.pushBack(elem);
00149   }
00150 
00151   GTreeItem* cur = _Base::_root;
00152   while (1) {
00153     if (cur->_key > k) {
00154       if (cur->_prev != 0) {
00155         cur = cur->_prev;
00156         continue;
00157       }
00158       else {
00159         cur->_prev = new GTreeItem;
00160         cur->_prev->_key = k;
00161         cur->_prev->_list.pushBack(elem);
00162         break;
00163       }
00164     }
00165     else if (cur->_key < k) {
00166       if (cur->_next != 0) {
00167         cur = cur->_next;
00168         continue;
00169       }
00170       else {
00171         cur->_next = new GTreeItem;
00172         cur->_next->_key = k;
00173         cur->_next->_list.pushBack(elem);
00174         break;
00175       }
00176     }
00177     else {
00178       cur->_list.pushBack(elem);
00179       break;
00180     }
00181   }
00182   // re-balancing?
00183 }
00184 
00185 template <class T>
00186 GDList<GMultiSetItem>* GMultiSet<T>::decendingOrder()
00187 { 
00188   GDList<GTreeItem>* list = GBTree<GTreeItem>::infixOrder();
00189   GDListCursor<GTreeItem> lc(list);
00190   GDList<GMultiSetItem>* res = new GDList<GMultiSetItem>;
00191   while (lc.hasPrev()) {
00192     GTreeItem& ti = lc.getPrev();
00193     res->concat(ti._list);
00194     delete &ti;
00195   }
00196   delete list;
00197   return res;
00198 }
00199 
00200 template <class T>
00201 GDList<GMultiSetItem>* GMultiSet<T>::ascendingOrder()
00202 { 
00203   GDList<GTreeItem>* list = GBTree<GTreeItem>::infixOrder();
00204   GDListCursor<GTreeItem> lc(*list);
00205   GDList<GMultiSetItem>* res = new GDList<GMultiSetItem>;
00206   while (lc.hasNext()) {
00207     GTreeItem& ti = const_cast<GTreeItem&>(lc.getNext());
00208     res->concat(ti._list);
00209     delete &ti;
00210   }
00211   delete list;
00212   return res;
00213 }
